      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This is a main method. It methods mains.
        Parameters:
        args - Does absolutely nothing in this program

      • newGame

        public void newGame()
        Sets a new game up by saying that the game is not over and making the players place their ships.

      • init

        public void init()
        This method initiate new objects.

      • gameOver

        public void gameOver()
        Ends the game, pops a prompt to the player, and cleans variables between games. This also starts a new game if the player has prompted it whether through the prompt or from being called before the game is over. Prompt.

      • coordinates

        public void coordinates(int x,
               int y)
        This is called by the gui once a square has been pressed It takes the coordinates of that square and sends them to the ai to be bombed It then lets the ai have its turn
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the column to be bombed
        y - The y coordinate of the row to be bombed

      • getGui

        public static Gui getGui()

      • setPlayerTurn

        public void setPlayerTurn()
        Called by gui to say the whole fleet is now placed by the human player The player can start attacking the enemy

      • printHighScore

        public void printHighScore()
        This updates the current high score list and makes the gui print it

      • updateHighScore

        public void updateHighScore()
        This reads the high scores from a file, adds it to the current high scores and if there's been a change, then writes

      • writeHighScore

        public void writeHighScore()
        This method writes the highscore to a text-file

      • getDifficulty

        public int getDifficulty()
        Returns:
        0 if training, 1 if easy, 2 if normal, 3 if hard, 4 if impossible

      • setDifficulty

        public void setDifficulty(int newDifficulty)
        This lets the player change difficulty in the middle of a game. It also starts a new game with that difficulty.
        Parameters:
        int - newDifficulty The new difficulty that has been chosen 0 is training, 1 is training, 2 is normal, 3 is hard, 4 is impossible

      • isPlayerTurn

        public static boolean isPlayerTurn()
        Returns if it's the players turn
        Returns:
        returns true if it's the players turn else false
